Package fb.datatype

This package contains the runtime implementations of the IEC 61131-3 data types and extensions supported by the FBDK .

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ANY The abstract superclass used to create all variables.
ANYImpl The implementation class of the ANY abstract type.
ARRAY This class implements arrays as defined in IEC 61499-1
ASN1 A utility class for ASN.1 encoding and decoding.
BOOL This is the iec 61131-3 BOOL data type.
BYTE This is the BYTE data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
COLOR Instances of this data type contain an instance of java.awt.Color.
DATE_AND_TIME The IEC 61499-1 DATE_AND_TIME data type, whose value is a Java Date.
DINT This is the DINT data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
DWORD This is the DWORD data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
EnumeratedData The abstract superclass for IEC 61131-3 enumerated data types.
INT This is the INT data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
LINT This is the LINT data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
LREAL This is the LREAL data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
LWORD This is the LWORD data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
MATRIX A matrix of float values in [row][column] format.
REAL This is the REAL data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
SINT This is the SINT data type defined in IEC 611131-3.
STRING This class implements the IEC 61499-1 STRING data type as an array of bytes.
StructuredData The abstract superclass for IEC 61131-3 structured data types.
TIME The IEC 61499-1 TIME data type, whose value is a Java long giving the time interval in microseconds.
UDINT This is the UDINT data type defined in IEC 61131-3.
UINT This is the UINT data type defined in IEC 61131-3.
USINT This is the USINT data type defined in IEC 61131-3.
WORD This is the WORD data type defined in IEC 61499-1.
WSTRING This class implements the IEC 61499-1 WSTRING data type.
 

Exception Summary
FBDataTypeException An Exception indicating that an error has occurred while executing a run-time management command.
 

Package fb.datatype Description

This package contains the runtime implementations of the IEC 61131-3 data types and extensions supported by the FBDK .
